Name: Asparagus (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring. Takes 9 days to produce a bundle of stalks. Grows on five small supports.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the spring. Takes 9 days to produce a bundle of stalks. Grows on five small supports.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the spring. Takes 9 days to produce a bundle of stalks. Grows on five small supports.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Braucht 9 Tage, um einen ganzen Bündel zu produzieren. Wächst auf fünf kleinen Stützen.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the spring. Takes 9 days to produce a bundle of stalks. Grows on five small supports.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the spring. Takes 9 days to produce a bundle of stalks. Grows on five small supports.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте весной. Вырастает через 9 дней. Растет на пяти небольших опорах.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天种植。 需要9天生产一捆芦笋。 生长在五个小架子上。
